protein.specific_function: ATP + a protein = ADP + a phosphoprotein

reference.reference_text: Manning G, Whyte DB, Martinez R, Hunter T, Sudarsanam S: The protein kinase complement of the human genome. Science. 2002 Dec 6;298(5600):1912-34.
